concept.title: Example: Index range defined in a single topic
concept.shortdesc: In this scenario, an index range is defined directly in the body of a topic.

conbody.p: In the following code sample, the index range begins at the start of the second paragraph and continues to the beginning of the last paragraph.
conbody.codeblock:
Accounting regulations

Be ethical in your accounting.

rulesRemember to do all of the following: ...

Failure to comply will get you audited.
